text: The Battle of Doljești was fought on 12 April 1457 and the Battle of Orbic was fought on 14 April 1457 between the forces of Ştefan cel Mare and the forces of Petru Aron. Ştefan cel Mare was aided by the Wallachians under Vlad III the Impaler. Ştefan's forces were victorious, and he was made Stephen III of Moldavia. Doljești and Orbic Category:1457 in Europe Category:Conflicts in 1457 Category:Stephen III of Moldavia
title: Battle of Doljești and Orbic
